name: Association of Industry, Agriculture and Services
goal: Strong Slovak business organization with international exposure. The independent partner companies focus on their core businesses in the production of biofuels, ethanol, spirits, alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, IT, wholesale of fuels, agricultural and food products, transportation (trains and trucks), logistic and billing services.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
